Of course, I'd be happy to recommend some movies based on your preferences! 🎬

If you enjoyed the atmospheric and suspenseful vibe of Titanic, you might enjoy "Smilla's Sense of Snow" - it's a mystery drama that follows a half-Inuit woman as she investigates the death of a young boy who ran off a snowy roof in Copenhagen. The film has a similar cold and atmospheric feel to Titanic, and features a talented cast including Julia Ormond and Vanessa Redgrave. 😊

Alternatively, if you're looking for something a bit more fast-paced and action-packed, "The Andromeda Strain" might be up your alley. This 1971 sci-fi thriller follows a team of scientists as they race against time to uncover the source of a deadly contagion that has killed a small town's population. With a talented cast including David Wayne and Paula Kelly, this movie is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat! 💥

I hope these recommendations are helpful, and I wish you a great movie experience! 🎬
